summary: Highly motivated leader with five years of experience in business development with a passion for process improvement and dedication to achieving goals. Proven record of strategic management by increasing operational efficiency and collaboration amongst interdepartmental teams. Dedicated to high levels of customer satisfaction and meeting aggressive business goals.

fieldsOfStudy: MBA with a concentration in Healthcare Information Systems

headline: Administrator in Training, ACCELerate Exton

message.text:
Thank you to our #first responders! You are a critical part in the health and well-being of the #Exton #community!

Anna Godbold Kern DeCurre, MBA, NHA, CDP Uwchlan Ambulance Corps

#ACCELerate is grateful for the compassionate and essential #care you provide to the community and our patients. We give a heartfelt Thank you to our frontline hero’s!

#EMSweek #firstresponders #compassion 

Uwchlan Ambulance Corps Celeste Foltz, MBA Melinda Monasterski Kern DeCurre, MBA, NHA, CDP

How do artist greet one another?

Yellow! 🎨


Today we enjoyed watching our 
ACCELerating artists use their #creative outlets to make beautiful pieces! 👩🏼‍🎨


Anna Godbold  Melissa Novack-Hamilton Kern DeCurre, MBA, NHA, CDP #MainLine #Exton #ArtTherapy

Sweet Caroline🎶🎶

We are….enjoying a fan favorite at #ACCELerate Exton! Thank you, Tom Guest, for another fun-filled afternoon! 


Kern DeCurre, MBA, NHA, CDP  Anna Godbold Melissa Hamilton #TomGuest #MainLine #Exton #SNFConcertSeries #WeAre #SweetCaroline

Thank You to Michael and his team at #SageLife for the generous lunch to celebrate our #nurses! 

We are excited to work with a team so passionate about #seniors! 

#MainLine #ACCELerateExton
#EchoLake

Kern DeCurre, MBA, NHA, CDP 
Anna Godbold 
Melissa Hamilton 
Brittany W.

A Happy Nurses Week message from  #ACCELerate Exton’s patients and team members! 🩹👩🏼‍⚕️👨🏻‍⚕️🩺⚕️

Sharon McDermond 
Kern DeCurre, MBA, NHA, CDP 
Anna Godbold Melissa Hamilton Ivy Deborah Genesis 

#NursesWeek #Nurses #NursesACCELERATEyourcare
#CelebrateNurses #MainLine #Exton

What an honor it is to work alongside 
a remarkable team while serving our community! Thank you to Anna Godbold, Melissa Hamilton, Ivy Deborah, and team for the #celebrations yesterday! 

As I am in the midst of the AIT program, I am excited to celebrate my completion of the Philadelphia College of Osteopathic Medicine 
NHA course and serving this center for seven months. Looking forward to the next steps in completing the program app, obtaining a license, and making an #impact on the next community I have the #honor of #serving. 

#AIT #NHA #Exton #MainLine #SNF #LTC

It’s a big “dill” to work with partners that care for your patients and your team! 🥒 

Healthcare is a #collaborative field! We are never in a pickle when working with Savanna Carr-Brooks! Thank you for your collaboration to create the best outcomes for #seniors (and for the Support Pickle 🤣)! 

#Exton #MainLine #SNF

Sunrise brought the #Sunshine! ☀️

Thank you to the incredible Morgan Breting and her Sunrise Senior Living team for hosting a flower bouquet program! Our patients loved it! 💐

Proud to work so closely with partners that love #seniors as much as we do! 

Kern DeCurre, MBA, NHA, CDP 
Melissa Hamilton 
Anna Godbold

What a Dino-mite day at #Exton! 🦕 

The team had fun #twinning and visiting #Teddy the #therapydog!


Melissa Hamilton Imani Brown Anna Godbold #MainLine #TwinDay #ACCELerate #FunFridays

Petals Please made our Daisy! 

🌸🌷🌻🌼🪻🌹

Thank you to the Petals Please team for the flower donations! Our patients love receiving these beautiful arrangements! 

Melissa Hamilton 
Anna Godbold 

#MainLine #Exton #PetalsPlease #BuildingCommunity #Flowers #SNF #Exton

No Sunday Scaries at #ACCELerate! 

We operate interdisciplinary teams 7 days a week because healthcare doesn’t follow a Monday-Friday schedule! 

Special shout out to a fan favorite, Tom Guest! Thanks for the fun live #concert! 

#SNF #MainLine #Exton 
Melissa Hamilton
Amazing event! Thanks for the invite! It’s always great catching up with you!

Wow, thank you so much to everyone who joined us at the Chop House Thursday night!  Incredible group of professionals that I am grateful and proud to call my friends❤️.  Cheers to more nights like this🥂🥂.    Greatly appreciate all the support, so amazing - THANK YOU

What an #ACCELerating day for team #Exton!

We spent the morning reconnecting and developing new #partnerships throughout the #community at our Meet & Greet! Thank you to all of the #professionals that supported the event! 

Later in the day, Team Exton enjoyed a spectacular #networking event with Lynn Walsh and the Fieldstone at Chester Springs team! Congratulations on the new center! We can’t wait for the grand tour! 

#MainLine #SNF #Healthcare #Networking #Community #Connecgions #Relationships #LynnWalsh Kern DeCurre, MBA, NHA, CDP 
Melissa Hamilton  Jennifer Whiteford-Givler Savanna Carr-Brooks Anna Godbold Lynn Walsh Frank Lemperes Keira Riley

⚾️ Opening Day ⚾️

ACCELerate Exton kicked off the Philadelphia Phillies game with popcorn and the big screen! 


Melissa Hamilton 
#SNF #MainLine #ChesterCounty
#OpeningDay #MLB

Are you ready to #ACCELerate your career? 
 
Our luxurious ACCELerate Exton facility is seeking #compassionate individuals to join our #growing team. At Exton, we are dedicated to providing high-quality care and improving the lives of our patients. 
 
Join us on Thursday, April 4th from 10am-6pm to learn more about how you can #ACCELerate your career with us! Don't miss out on this opportunity to make a difference in the lives of others while advancing your career.

Sharon McDermond
Kern DeCurre, MBA, NHA, CDP
Melissa Hamilton 

#Exton #Coatesville #Parksburg #Dowingtown #Hiring #MainLine #SNFJobs #JoinAnACCELeratingTeam

The #ShenaniganSquad is at it again! 

Today we’re celebrating all of our lucky charms at Exton! ☘️

#stpatricksday #Green #luckycharms #Genesis #accelerate #snf

ACCELerating tastes await! 

At ACCELerate, every aspect of a patient’s experience is #elevated to enhance their overall wellbeing, #vitality, and outcome! 

At ACCELerate Exton, we are proud to serve our patients a nutritious meal in our fine dining room! 

#MainLine #Exton #skillednursing #finedining #nutrition #PowerBack #Accelerate #Genesis

Team #Exton played an ACCELerating game of ‘Guess the Oreo Flavor!’ 


Nabisco #skillednursing #mainlinepa #PowerBackTherapy #genesishealthcare #oreo #oreocookieday Melissa Hamilton
